title: Ticket times for support for false ban is insane!
body: Been waiting for almost a day for an explanation to the false ban I received for supposed MMR boosting. I have been loyal to this game for years and I finally work my way to gold and get a hammer saying no! This is insane!

replies.body: Tickets are respodned to in the order received, unless you are replying to them which will bump you back to the bottom.  I do see you have multiple tickets op on this, so keep in mind one will likely be closed to prevent confusion or delay in responding.  Hang tight and our player behavior team will respond as soon as they can!
